channel.title: How do i amke npc passive
channel.description:
hey guys
so i just made some green dragons and when i log on they attack both of them. i want to know hot to make them not attack???
plz help me:)
Pic of what i put in the auto spawn- http://screensnapr.com/v/PmIk9T.jpg tell me if thats wrong place to change it.
